p: The median final total cell concentration and the median final CFU concentration of the raw linseed oil and olive oil suspensions both differed significantly from the no‐carbon suspensions ( p < 0.001). The median final total cell concentration of the raw linseed oil suspensions was similar compared to the median cell concentrations of the olive oil suspensions ( p = 0.85). However, the median CFU concentration of the olive oil suspensions during incubation (Time >0 days) was significantly higher than the median CFU concentration of the raw linseed oil suspensions ( p < 0.001). The measurement at day 8 of the raw linseed oil suspensions (Figure 2) was significantly lower compared to the concentration at days 3 and 14 ( p < 0.001).
